name: Astrocop
overview: Policía espacial decían, verás mundo decían y así es como has acabado en la Patrulla de rescate gatuna. Tendrás que recorrer el espacio en busca de esos gatos perdidos que nadie ha podido recuperar y darles al fin la vida que se merecen. Space police they said, you will see world they said and that is how you ended up in the cat rescue patrol. You will have to travel through space in search of those lost cats that no one has been able to recover and finally give them the life they deserve.
